backend/main.mo: Main backend actor defining types, maps, and storage/authorization mixins for users, benches, documents, components, and history.
backend/migration.mo: Migration module containing legacy type definitions and a no-op migration function returning the previous actor state.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report listing implemented features, associated files, components, and test IDs.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Text file containing prewritten summaries of various frontend files for documentation or tooling use.
frontend/DEPLOYMENT_PRODUCTION_DRAFT_V36: Production deployment checklist for Draft Version 36 with environment, build, and backend verification steps.
frontend/DEPLOYMENT_PRODUCTION_DRAFT_V47: Production deployment checklist for Draft Version 47 outlining environment validation and build/deploy steps.
frontend/DEPLOYMENT_PRODUCTION_DRAFT_V48: Production deployment checklist for Draft Version 48 describing prerequisites and required environment variables.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind configuration with custom CSS variables defining themes, colors, and global styles.
frontend/index.html: Basic HTML entry point that loads the app root and main TypeScript bundle.
frontend/README_PRODUCTION_ENV.md: Documentation of required production environment variables for the frontend, including canister IDs and II configuration.
frontend/SMOKE_TEST_PRODUCTION_DRAFT_V36: Smoke test script for version 36 covering sign‑in, protected routes, and profile setup persistence.
frontend/SMOKE_TEST_PRODUCTION_DRAFT_V47: Updated version 47 smoke test with steps for authentication, navigation, and profile setup validation.
frontend/SMOKE_TEST_PRODUCTION_DRAFT_V48: More detailed version 48 smoke test including diagnostics, authentication, and profile persistence checks.
frontend/SMOKE_TEST_PRODUCTION_RESULTS_V: Template for recording smoke test results for version 36, including sign‑in outcomes and notes.
Results template for version 47 smoke tests with fields for status and console errors.
Version 48 smoke test results template with structured sections for each test area.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Sets up routing, providers, and layout logic including separate public and protected route trees.
Permission gate component that checks admin status and blocks access with alerts if unauthorized.
frontend/src/components/AppErrorBoundary: React error boundary that displays an alert and allows reloading when errors occur.
frontend/src/components/auth/ActorGate.t: Wraps children and blocks rendering until the backend actor is loaded, showing loading or error states.
frontend/src/components/auth/AuthGate.ts: Ensures the user is authenticated via Internet Identity, redirecting or prompting sign‑in when needed.
frontend/src/components/dnd/DraggableLis: Renders a draggable list UI with customizable items and visual drag feedback.
frontend/src/components/dnd/useDraggable: Provides state and handlers for reordering items via drag‑and‑drop.
frontend/src/components/export/ExportDia: Implements a dialog for exporting data with options for scope, format, filters, and BenchExpert ZIP logic.
Top‑level layout with navigation, theme toggle, user menu, and export dialog launcher.
frontend/src/components/navigation/Scrol: Shows floating buttons to scroll to top or bottom based on current scroll position.
frontend/src/components/profile/EntityTa: Single‑value entity tag input with suggestions, add/remove behavior, and validation.
frontend/src/components/profile/Predefin: Displays a grid of predefined avatar options and allows selecting one.
frontend/src/components/profile/UserAvat: Renders a user avatar from predefined or custom images with cache‑busting support.
frontend/src/components/theme/ThemeToggl: Toggles between light and dark themes using next‑themes.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor tied to the user’s identity, refetching dependent queries when the actor changes.
Provides a store for forcing avatar reloads by updating a timestamp-based cache buster.
frontend/src/hooks/useDashboardChartType: Stores and persists the user’s selected dashboard chart type in localStorage.
frontend/src/hooks/useExportDialogData.t: Fetches all test benches and unique component names for export dialogs using the backend actor.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Manages Internet Identity authentication, exposing identity state, login, and logout functions.
Periodically updates the user’s last-seen timestamp on the backend when authenticated.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines React Query hooks for fetching and mutating test benches, profiles, and related backend data.
frontend/src/i18n/I18nProvider.tsx: Loads, stores, and persists the current language, syncing with backend when authenticated.
frontend/src/i18n/languages.ts: Defines supported languages and helpers for validating and retrieving language names and flags.
frontend/src/i18n/translations.ts: Contains translation dictionaries for supported languages, primarily English in this file segment.
frontend/src/i18n/useI18n.ts: Provides translation access with fallback logic and a helper for humanized keys.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind setup defining light and dark theme CSS variables and applying base styles.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Entrypoint rendering the React app with query client and Internet Identity provider.
frontend/src/pages/Admin/AdminPage.tsx: Admin dashboard page with tabs for benches, documents, and users using i18n labels.
frontend/src/pages/Admin/components/Admi: Lists all benches with delete actions, loading state, and a confirmation dialog.
Displays documents with bench associations and supports downloading them.
Shows the current user's profile details and preference settings.
frontend/src/pages/Benches/BenchDetailPa: Bench detail view allowing edits, component management, history viewing, and delete actions.
frontend/src/pages/Benches/BenchListPage: Lists benches with search and add‑bench modal, handling loading and empty states.
frontend/src/pages/Benches/components/Ad: Modal form for creating a test bench with fields, validation, photo upload, tags, documents, components, and optional duplication to other benches.
frontend/src/pages/Benches/components/Be: Editor table for adding, editing, removing, and evaluating component expiration status for a bench.
Manages bench documents, including loading, uploading, editing, duplicating, deleting, and associating documents to a bench.
Displays chronological history entries for a bench with timestamps, user info, and optional details.
Renders a bench photo with loading and error fallback behavior using an ExternalBlob URL.
frontend/src/pages/Benches/components/Do: Allows selecting document categories and attaching versioned files per category for bench creation.
frontend/src/pages/Benches/components/Du: Dialog allowing users to select benches and duplicate a component to multiple destinations, with validation and success/error handling.
Dialog for duplicating a document to other benches that don't already have it, handling selection, API calls, and toast messaging.
frontend/src/pages/Benches/components/Ed: Dialog to edit a bench document’s metadata and optionally replace its file, including upload progress and form validation.
Modal for editing bench details such as name, URLs, description, tags, and photo, with validation and file upload support.
frontend/src/pages/Benches/components/Mo: Dialog enabling users to move a component from the current bench to a selected destination bench with API integration and error handling.
frontend/src/pages/Benches/components/Ta: A tag input component that lets users add, remove, and pick from suggested tags with keyboard support and a popover selector.
Static placeholder page showing planned features for creating a new test bench, including photo upload, metadata fields, tags, and document attachments.
frontend/src/pages/Dashboard/components/: Processes movement history to aggregate bench-to-bench transfers and displays them as ranked flow rows with counts and progress bars.
Computes expiration status counts across benches and renders them as a pie chart showing OK, expiring soon, and expired components.
Builds per-bench expiration status counts and displays them in a bar chart grouped by OK, expiring soon, and expired.
Groups components by expiration date ranges and visualizes the distribution in a bar chart.
Counts documents by category and displays the distribution as a pie chart with category-based colors.
Aggregates components by expiration month and visualizes the trend as either a bar or line chart.
Computes expired component counts per bench and displays them in either a bar or line chart with i18n text and empty‑state handling.
Aggregates component expiration statuses and shows percentages using progress bars to visualize overall bench health.
Defines a draggable list of dashboard statistic cards, prepares bench data, and renders various chart components based on saved order.
frontend/src/pages/DashboardPage.tsx: Loads benches, components, documents, and history from the backend, enables section reordering, and renders the main dashboard sections.
frontend/src/pages/ProfilePage.tsx: Provides a full user profile editor including personal info, avatar, language, and expiration‑threshold settings with backend persistence.
frontend/src/pages/SignInPage.tsx: Displays the login screen using Internet Identity, handles errors, and redirects authenticated users to the dashboard.
frontend/src/pages/Users/UserProfileDeta: Displays a user profile by principal ID, handling invalid IDs, loading states, errors, and rendering profile details.
frontend/src/utils/avatars.ts: Provides a map of avatar IDs to image paths and helpers to retrieve avatar paths and IDs.
frontend/src/utils/blobUpload.ts: Uploads a file as an ExternalBlob with optional progress tracking.
frontend/src/utils/defaultBenchPhoto.ts: Fetches and converts a default bench placeholder image into an ExternalBlob.
frontend/src/utils/download.ts: Downloads files from ExternalBlob references or raw blobs by triggering browser downloads.
frontend/src/utils/errors.ts: Normalizes various error types into user-friendly messages with specific backend mappings.
frontend/src/utils/expirationSettings.ts: Manages expiration-threshold settings, combining localStorage defaults with user profile overrides and computing expiration status.
frontend/src/utils/export/benchExpertZip: Generates a text-based bench expert export for selected benches and triggers download as a .txt file.
Filters benches, components, and history from export payloads based on user-selected options and scope.
frontend/src/utils/export/exportGenerato: Provides functions to export filtered data as CSV, TXT, or SQLite, assembling formatted content and triggering file downloads.
frontend/src/utils/export/sqliteExport.t: Dynamically loads sql.js and builds a SQLite database containing benches, components, and history data for export.
frontend/src/utils/id.ts: Generates a unique ID using a timestamp and random string.
frontend/src/utils/rewriteDescription.ts: Cleans and normalizes bench descriptions by fixing whitespace, capitalization, punctuation, and common abbreviations.
frontend/src/utils/search.ts: Searches benches by matching query terms against bench fields and tags.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utilities for reading, persisting, and clearing URL and session parameters, including hash-based routing support.
frontend/src/utils/validation.ts: Provides input validation for emails, AGILE codes, semantic versions, and URLs.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures TailwindCSS themes, colors, typography, container queries, animations, and plugin setup.
frontend/tsconfig.node.json: Defines TypeScript config for Node-focused build files with ESNext modules and bundler resolution.
frontend/vite.config.ts: Configures Vite with React, environment variable injection, aliasing, dev server proxying, and build settings.
project_state.json: Defines project state, listing existing features, pending requests, and a primary issue about broken site translation, plus enhancements for document management, dashboard views, and data export.
